rows.transcript_1:
Sit down, close your eyes, and listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
Notice how you feel. When you are ready, open your eyes. 
Try this whenever you are feeling stressed and you need a break to reconnect.
rows.transript:

Nota c√≥mo te sientes. Cuando est√©s listo(a), abre los ojos.
Prueba esto cada vez que te sientas estresado(a) y necesites un descanso para reconectarte.
rows.title: Quick pause

text_1.eng: Take a moment to check in with yourself.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
